metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3807 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions 4.1.x before 4.1.9where records in the answer section of responses received fromauthoritative servers with the AA flag not set were not properly validated,allowing an attacker to bypass DNSSEC validation.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
